value:
Being marquess has me cooped up
in a castle all day. I don't have time to
move around like this anymore.$k$pThat's a pretty big plus for this place!

I often wonder who would win in a
spar... My kid, or Eliwood's. Those
two don't spar like we used to!

Hey, try not to look like you're just
loitering. The big boss has gotta be
looking in control and composed!$k$pHuh? Same goes for me? Aw, you
know as well as I do, that just isn't my
style.

This castle never fails to impress. But
my hope is that someday kingdoms
won't need sturdy walls for protection.$k$pThere will just be peace.

I'm Hector, Marquess of Ostia. I'm
here at the request of your friend
$Nf.$k$pCan you make sure their message
gets to the right person?

Oho, now this is more like it! The
great Lord Hector's true power!

Not bad, not bad... But I know
there's more I can do!

Uh... Is that it? Maybe I'm losing
my touch.

It's like polishing a diamond. I just
get brighter and brighter!

I'm Hector, Marquess of Ostia.
Armads and I both are in your
service.$k$pMan, fancy introductions like that just
aren't my style...

Mind sitting with me for a bit? There's
something I want to ask you.$k$pDo you...believe in destiny?$k$pNot too long ago, I would've laughed
at the idea. But now... Well, things
sure have changed.$k$pWhether or not you believe in destiny
isn't what matters. What matters is
that you don't regret your decisions.$k$pAs long as you're strong to the core,
you'll be ready no matter what the
future throws at you.$k$pYou won't blink when faced with a life-
or-death moment.$k$pThis goes for me... But it goes for you,
too. I can just tell. The look on your
face says it all.$k$pI know, I know, I'm not usually one for
talks such as these. Being marquess
is one thing I'm not cut out for.$k$pBut I guess... It is what it is, right? And
that means I've gotta lecture from
time to time, so just work with me.
うおおっ！
そらよっ！
うああっ！
ちぃっ！
I'm ending this!
Caught ya sleeping!
This is it!
Armads!
Was just...getting started...
はははっ！
Legendary Hero? Uh... I don't get it. You mean like the Eight Legends?
Huh? You managed to sneak up on me? Oh... Good work.
My brother's burden and his feelings for his people... I will carry them myself.
Sitting on some throne isn't really my style... But...
Someday my kid and Eliwood's will spar. That'll settle who's stronger, once and for all.
War is coming. Someday, a terrible war...
I'm counting on you. I want you to guide my children and me.
Got it.
Which one's mine?
Let's get moving!
